item.title: Readings shared October 17, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on 17 October 2024 are

  • Readings shared October 16, 2024. #AI #Education #FunctionalProgramming #Haskell #ITP #Lean4 #MachineLearning #Math1
  • The Haskell Unfolder Episode 34: You already understand monads. ~ Edsko de Vries (@EdskoDeVries), Andres Löh (@kosmikus@functional.cafe). #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Ollama-haskell: Haskell bindings for Ollama. ~ Tushar Adhatrao. #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming #Ollama #LLMs
  • Big advance on simple-sounding math problem was a century in the making. ~ Erica Klarreich (@EricaKlarreich). #Math
  • Thinking about 12 aspects of personal information/knowledge management. ~ Sacha Chua (@sacha@social.sachachua.com). #Emacs #OrgMode
  • Manual en español de GNU/Emacs 29.1. ~ Tano. #Emacs

item.title: Readings shared October 15, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on 15 October 2024 are

  • Readings shared October 13, 2024. #AI #CategoryTheory #Coq #Education #FunctionalProgramming #Haskell #ITP #ITP
  • On using GeoGebra and ChatGPT for geometric discovery. ~ Francisco Botana, Tomás Recio, María Pilar Vélez. #GeoGebra #ChatGPT #Math #AI
  • Lean: First steps (12 - Odd & Even ). ~ Tariq Rashid (@rzeta0@mastodon.social) #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • Tutorial videos for the course "Lean: First Steps". ~ Tariq Rashid (@rzeta0@mastodon.social). #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • The handshaking lemma. ~ Christoph Spiegel. #ITP #LeanProver #Lean4 #Math
  • Water sort in Haskell. ~ Nicolas Audinet de Pieuchon. #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • The power of Prolog. ~ Markus Triska (@MarkusTriska). #Prolog #LogicProgramming
  • Programación lógica con restricciones. #Prolog #LogicProgramming
  • Emacs para ciencias del dato. #Emacs #OrgMode
  • The λ-calculus, 2: The Church-Rosser theorem. ~ Lawrence Paulson (@LawrPaulson@mathstodon.xyz). #LambdaCalculus

item.title: Readings shared October 8, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on 8 October 2024 are

  • Readings shared October 7, 2024. #ITP #Lean4 #IsabelleHOL #Logic #Math #Calculemus #LLMs
  • Formalising the double-pushout approach to graph transformation. ~ Robert Söldner, Detlef Plump. #ITP #IsabelleHOL
  • Formal BOOK (formalizing "Proofs from THE BOOK" by Martin Aigner and Günter M. Ziegler). ~ Moritz Firsching, Nick Kuhn, Ralf Stephan, Christopher Schmidt. #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • Bonn Lean Course WiSe 24/25. ~ Floris van Doorn. #ITP #Lean4
  • BonnLeanCourse: 1 - Introduction to Lean 4. ~ Floris van Doorn. #ITP #Lean4
  • Conway normal form: Bridging approaches for comprehensive formalization of surreal numbers. ~ Karol Pąk, Cezary Kaliszyk. #ITP #Mizar #Math
  • What is theoretical computer science? ~ Moshe Y. Vardi. #CompSci #Math
  • Literate Org Haskell. ~ F. Murillo. #Emacs #OrgMode #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Using Org Mode to write and organize a book. ~ Ron Galloway. #Emacs #OrgMode

item.title: Lecturas compartidas el 14 de mayo de 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
Las lecturas compartidas en Mastodon el 14 de mayo de 2024 son

  • #Calculemus: Demostraciones con Lean4 e Isabelle/HOL de "Si G es un grupo y a, b ∈ G, entonces (ab)⁻¹ = b⁻¹a⁻¹". #ITP #Lean4 #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • #Exercitium: Matrices de Toepliz. #Haskell #Python #Matemáticas
  • Schönhage-Strassen multiplication (in Isabelle/HOL). ~ Jakob Schulz. #ITP #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • An entry into the world of Org Mode for non Emacs users. ~ James Stoup. #Emacs #OrgMode
  • Writing Lisp code with ChatGPT. #Elisp #ChatGPT
